<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="">[Cleansing Flames](/Spells.aspx?ID=852)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 74</row>

**Bloodline**
[Phoenix](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=15)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You wrap the target in purifying flames. You can attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) a single [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) or non-[curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38) effect imparting the [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7), [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), or [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) condition. The target can choose to empower the flames with their life force, becoming [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (or increasing their drained value by 1, if already under the condition) to grant you a +1 circumstance bonus to your counteract check.
